name: Space Game (Python)
description:
This game was made in about 3 days. This was my first try using pygame and OOP in python.

This game requires you to install python and pygame.

Here is the artpack used for this game:

https://pxldev.itch.io/1-bit-space-pack

Note:

I was not able to create an .exe file for this project. This means that the game must be run with python.

Controls:

Press space to shoot, WASD and arrow keys to move.
